title: Little Burrow Garden
description: The Little Burrow Garden is a sleepy, storybook-inspired pattern collection featuring hand-painted florals, sweet woodland rabbits, and a soft coordinating check. Delicate watercolour details and spacious layouts create a calm, whimsical feel.With a soothing palette of cream, soft sage, pale blue, and warm neutrals, the collection is designed for children’s apparel, baby textiles, nursery décor, and stationery: offering a timeless, comforting aesthetic with subtle character charm.
